Package <Unnamed>

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UserInterface
    Holds all the methods that should be made concrete in the class that implements this interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AI
    Controls how the computer will make it's guess.
    AIInfo
    Defines the properties and behaviour of AIInfo.
    Code
    Generates the pseudorandom list of possible colours, and the pseudorandom code.
    Constants
    Contains all the constants used in the project.
    Format
    Converts Lists into Strings.
    Indicators
    Holds the method that compares the guess and the code, calculates and returns the indicators.
    Mastermind
    Brings together all the other classes and their methods, allowing the game to be played.
    Row
    Defines the properties and behaviour of a row.
    SavedGame
    Deals with saving a game and restoring a saved game.
    Test
    Contains different tests that can be run to see whether the indicators returned are correct.
    TextUserInterface
    Contains all the methods that allow the program to interact with the user.
